title: "Cloud providers underutilizing GPUs for AI - report"
excerpt: "Cloud providers are underutilizing their GPUs despite deploying thousands, reports the Register. According to analyst firm TechInsights, in 2023 878,000 accelerators were responsible for turning out seven million GPU-hours of work, for an estimated $5.8 billion in revenue spending."
